faq.a1: There may be no recent trades in that direction, or fees haven't accumulated to minimum units yet.

hero.title: Tokenize Your Green Impact, Build a Sustainable Future
hero.description: Leverage blockchain technology to tokenize your environmental actions into verifiable NFT assets. Turn your green initiatives into tradeable carbon credits and contribute to the decentralized sustainability ecosystem.

tech.title: Built on Cutting-Edge Technology
tech.subtitle: Powered by the most advanced blockchain technology and Web3 infrastructure

createNFT.title: Mint Green NFTs
createNFT.description: Tokenize your environmental initiatives as verifiable on-chain assets. Document transportation choices, energy efficiency measures, waste reduction, and sustainability projects with immutable blockchain records.

audit.title: Decentralized Verification
audit.description: Independent validators authenticate your environmental claims using cryptographic proof systems, ensuring each NFT represents verifiable real-world impact with full transparency.
audit.subtitle: Trustless verification protocol

exchange.title: Carbon Credit DeFi
exchange.description: Trade verified green NFTs for carbon tokens in our decentralized marketplace. Participate in carbon credit liquidity pools and yield farming while driving environmental impact.
exchange.subtitle: DeFi-powered green economy

info.title: NFT Exchange Guide
info.subtitle: Learn how to exchange your green NFTs for CARB tokens

step1.title: Submit Application
step1.desc: Select NFT in assets page and submit exchange application

step2.title: Wait for Audit
step2.desc: Auditor evaluates NFT actual value and determines exchange amount

step3.title: Execute Exchange
step3.desc: After audit approval, execute final exchange on this page

step4.title: Complete Exchange
step4.desc: NFT destroyed, receive corresponding CARB tokens

fees.title: Fee Information
fees.applicationFeeDesc: 1% of carbon reduction or 1 CARB, whichever is greater
fees.finalAmountDesc: 95% of audited value (after deducting system and audit fees)

history.title: My Exchange Records
history.noRecordsDesc: You haven't submitted any NFT exchange applications yet

exchange.title: Title
exchange.feeExplanation: Application fee is 1% of carbon reduction or 1 CARB, whichever is greater
exchange.notice1: After submitting the application, the NFT will enter the exchange process and cannot be revoked
exchange.notice2: The auditor will evaluate the actual value of the NFT and determine the final exchange amount
exchange.notice3: After the exchange is completed, the NFT will be destroyed and you will receive the corresponding CARB tokens
exchange.notice4: The actual credited amount will be deducted from system fees (1%) and audit fees (4%)
